interestingcomments.content:
Leica D-Lux 7 suddenly can’t connect to iPhone. /!/ Help!

I can’t seem to get my camera to connect to Leica Fotos app. On my phone, it tells me connection failed and to check to make sure that wifi is enabled on my camera. On my camera, it’s just stuck to “Connecting to WiFi”.

I’ve restarted my phone, paired and unpaired, downloaded and redownloaded the app but it still won’t connect. I’m out of ideas!
